title: Pixel 4 XL SIM Card isn't supported
content:
Hi, 

I bought a Verizon Pixel 4 XL, who is supposed to be unlocked, but when i put my sim card it doesn't work and i get the message: SIM Card isn't supported..

I talked to Verizon support and they told me that the phone is in fact unlocked and it should work. I tried with 4 different SIM Cards, three from different dominican networks and one from spain(mobistar) and they didn't work.

What can i do?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
